abstract: Berkshire Hathaway won U.S. antitrust approval to take over railroad operator Burlington Northern Santa Fe, the Federal Trade Commission said Monday.
snippet: Berkshire Hathaway won U.S. antitrust approval to take over railroad operator Burlington Northern Santa Fe, the Federal Trade Commission said Monday.
lead_paragraph: Berkshire Hathaway won U.S. antitrust approval to take over railroad operator Burlington Northern Santa Fe, the Federal Trade Commission said on Monday.

headline.main: Berkshire Wins U.S. Antitrust O.K. For Burlington
